eventDecorators.name: TokenPurchase
eventDecorators.description: 修改盲盒 boxIndex：盲盒索引 startTime：盲盒生效时间 endTime：盲盒失效时间.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: 修改盲盒 boxIndex：盲盒索引 startTime：盲盒生效时间 endTime：盲盒失效时间.

functionDecorators.name: recoverTokens
functionDecorators.description: This will be invoked by the owner, when owner wants to rescue tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Token which will we rescue to the owner from the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: Address to be removed to the whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: getUserCap
functionDecorators.description: Returns the cap of a specific user.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: Address whose cap is to be checked.

functionDecorators.name: addManyToWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Adds list of addresses to whitelist. Not overloaded due to limitations with truffle testing.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiaries
parameterDecorators.description: Addresses to be added to the whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: setGroupCap
functionDecorators.description: Sets a group of users' maximum contribution.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiaries
parameterDecorators.description: List of addresses to be capped.

functionDecorators.name: getUserContribution
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount contributed so far by a sepecific user.

functionDecorators.name: setUserCap
functionDecorators.description: Sets a specific user's maximum contribution.

functionDecorators.name: tokensToBeReturned
functionDecorators.description: Interface function, can be overwritten by the superclass.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Token which balance we will check and return.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: Address to be added to the whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: buyTokens
functionDecorators.description: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
